doc.after: Telecommunications refers to wave based communication technology through media such as air cables etc Telecommunication is the transmission of information over significant distances to communicate In earlier times telecommunications involved the use of visual signals such as beacons smoke signals semaphore telegraphs signal flags and optical heliographs or audio messages via coded drumbeats lung blown horns or sent by loud whistles for example In the modern age of electricity and electronics telecommunications now also includes the use of electrical devices such as telegraphs telephones and teleprinters the use of radio and microwave communications as well as fiber optics and their associated electronics plus the use of orbiting satellites and the Internet
